chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Hello, everyone.Welcome to News English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee.歡迎收聽新聞英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we'll be learning about news.這個單元,我們要來學習新聞英語。So first, let's listen to today's news.首先,來聽一下今天的新聞。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Weather-related power shortage report.Impactful weather conditions strain power grid.Our region is currently facing a weather-related power shortage due to the extreme weather conditions that have descended upon us.These adverse weather conditions have placed a huge burden on the power grid, resulting in disruptions to electricity supply.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Many areas are experiencing rolling blackouts while others have been without power for extended periods.Emergency services are working diligently to restore power to affected areas.But the situation remains fluid and challenging.Vulnerable populations, such as the elderly and those with medical needs, are particularly encouraged to seek shelter in safe, temperature-controlled environments.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 再來看一下標題。Weather-related power shortage report.Impactful weather conditions strain power grid.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Our region is currently facing a weather-related power shortage due to the extreme weather conditions that have descended upon us.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Due to extreme weather conditions that have descended upon us.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 這些惡劣的天氣狀況給電網帶來了極大的負擔,導致電力供應中斷。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 電力供應中斷。電力供應中斷。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 電力供應中斷。電力供應中斷。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 電力供應中斷。電力供應中斷。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 尋找安全、溫度控制的環境。Vulnerable是一個形容詞,就是脆弱的、易受傷的。The elderly指的就是老年人。Medical needs,醫療需求。Seek shelter指的是找尋庇護。以上就是本篇報導的解說。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 這個單元我們要來研究的文法重點是Due to。Due to是一個介系詞,後面要接上的是名詞,意思是因為啊、由於,經常使用在B動詞的後方。看一下本文的例句。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 本地區正面臨著與氣候相關的電力短缺是由於極端氣候狀況的原因。再看一句。大部分的問題都是由於人為失誤。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: 電力短缺,缺電。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Place a burden on,片語,加了負擔。Huge,形容詞,巨大的、龐大的。Result in,片語,導致。Disruption,名詞,中斷,顛覆。Electricity supply,名詞,電力供應。Rolling,形容詞,逐漸的。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Blockout,名詞,斷電,停電。Extended period,名詞,延展期。Restore,動詞,修復,使復原。Fluid,形容詞,不固定的,異變的。Medical needs,名詞,醫療需求。

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
chunks.chunk_text: Encourage,動詞,鼓勵,促進。Seek shelter,片語,尋求庇護。OK, that's all for this unit.最後請記得,每日十分鐘,讓您變成英語通。我是啟稟老師。Until then, see you next time.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Weather-Related Power Shortage Report_ Impactful Weather Condition
